thread.title: 'Hamilton' Cast Members to Perform at Super Bowl Pregame Show
thread.title_full: 'Hamilton' Cast Members to Perform at Super Bowl Pregame Show

author: NHHMS
title: 'Hamilton' Cast Members to Perform at Super Bowl Pregame Show
text:
Theo Wargo/Getty Images for Tony Awards Productions 
The cast of Hamilton at the Tony Awards on June 12, 2016. 
While it seems like just about everyone has seen Hamilton (or knows someone who has seen Hamilton ) by now, three cast members are about to take their talents to an even wider audience: the Super Bowl. 
It was announced today by the NFL that during the Super Bowl pregame show, Phillipa Soo, Renee Elise Goldsberry and Jasmine Cephas Jones — who played the roles of Eliza, Angelica and Peggy Schuyler in the hit musical — will perform “America the Beautiful.” 
Following the pregame show, Luke Bryan will sing the National Anthem, while Lady Gaga will headline the halftime performance. The Super Bowl takes place Feb. 5 and will air on FOX. TAGS
